name: The Bee Roll
description:
There is an elderly woman who has a garden, it's all she has, but the thing is she is a terrible gardener. A little bee notices this, and wants to help! So as a sort of ritual, every morning the bee wakes up, and tends to the lady's garden. "The title is a pun on the term B-roll, which refers to the parts in films which seemingly don't matter, (clouds passing, scene shots, etc) but those scenes are what exist between the action you know. So, I like to think we all have our own little worker bee tending to our own garden of life."
